body_html:
Replying to houssamn: Aten gets build in conjunction with pytorch when you either run `sudo python setup.py install` from the root pytorch folder or just `python setup.py install` if you're using Anaconda. Thank you, Soumith.

body:
Replying to houssamn: Aten gets build in conjunction with pytorch when you
either run `sudo python setup.py install` from the root pytorch folder or
just `python setup.py install` if you're using Anaconda.

Thank you, Soumith.

On Thu, Oct 18, 2018 at 11:27 AM houssamn <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> soumith's comment please
